constant_class.Name: LogChannels
constant_class.Comment: /** Channel definitions generated by the configurator utility */

constant.Name: LC_NONE
constant.Comment: No channel specified

constant.Name: LC_AMS
constant.Comment: AMS module channel

constant.Name: LC_CORE
constant.Comment: Core module channel

constant.Name: LC_MIDPSTRING
constant.Comment: Core midpString channel

constant.Name: LC_MALLOC
constant.Comment: Core malloc channel

constant.Name: LC_CORE_STACK
constant.Comment: Core stack usage tracing channel

constant.Name: LC_LOWUI
constant.Comment: Low level UI module channel

constant.Name: LC_I18N
constant.Comment: I18N module channel

constant.Name: LC_HIGHUI
constant.Comment: High level UI module channel

constant.Name: LC_HIGHUI_ITEM_LAYOUT
constant.Comment: High level UI item layout channel

constant.Name: LC_HIGHUI_ITEM_REPAINT
constant.Comment: High level UI item repaint channel

constant.Name: LC_HIGHUI_FORM_LAYOUT
constant.Comment: High level UI form layout channel

constant.Name: LC_HIGHUI_ITEM_PAINT
constant.Comment: High level UI form paint channel

constant.Name: LC_PROTOCOL
constant.Comment: Protocol module channel

constant.Name: LC_RMS
constant.Comment: RMS module channel

constant.Name: LC_SECURITY
constant.Comment: Security module channel

constant.Name: LC_SERVICES
constant.Comment: Services module channel

constant.Name: LC_TOOL
constant.Comment: Tools module channel

constant.Name: LC_JSR180
constant.Comment: JSR180 module channel

constant.Name: LC_EVENTS
constant.Comment: Event queue module channel

constant.Name: LC_STORAGE
constant.Comment: File Storage module channel

constant.Name: LC_PUSH
constant.Comment: Push registry module channel

constant.Name: LC_LIFECYCLE
constant.Comment: Pause/Resume functionality channel

constant.Name: LC_MMAPI
constant.Comment: MMAPI module channel

constant.Name: LOG_CURRENT
constant.Comment: A value indicating that there is no need to change the current logging level.

constant.Name: LOG_INFORMATION
constant.Comment: Logging level used to report information that is not associated with any significant condition.

constant.Name: LOG_WARNING
constant.Comment: Logging level used to report unexpected conditions that are typically fully recoverable.

constant.Name: LOG_ERROR
constant.Comment: Logging level used to report unexpected conditions that are typically at least partially recoverable.

constant.Name: LOG_CRITICAL
constant.Comment: Logging level used to report unexpected conditions that are typically not recoverable, or are catastrophic to the system.

constant.Name: LOG_DISABLED
constant.Comment: Logging level used to disable all output and all logging calls will be compiled out of the build.

constant.Name: REPORT_LEVEL
constant.Comment: Threshhold for the severity level below which log messages will not be recorded. Severity levels less than this value can be compiled out of the build.

constant.Name: AMS_MEMORY_RESERVED_MVM
constant.Comment: Default AMS memory reserved in MVM mode

constant.Name: AMS_MEMORY_LIMIT_MVM
constant.Comment: Default AMS memory limit in MVM mode

constant.Name: MIDLET_CONSTRUCTOR_FAILED
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's constructor fails to catch a runtime exception

constant.Name: MIDLET_SUITE_NOT_FOUND
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet suite is not found

constant.Name: MIDLET_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a class needed to create a MIDlet is not found.

constant.Name: MIDLET_INSTANTIATION_EXCEPTION
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when intantiation exception is thrown during the intantiation of a MIDlet.

constant.Name: MIDLET_ILLEGAL_ACCESS_EXCEPTION
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when illegal access exception is thrown during the intantiation of a MIDlet.

constant.Name: MIDLET_OUT_OF_MEM_ERROR
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's constructor runs out of memory.

constant.Name: MIDLET_RESOURCE_LIMIT
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a the system cannot reserve enough resource to start a MIDlet suite.

constant.Name: MIDLET_ISOLATE_CONSTRUCTOR_FAILED
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's isolate constructor throws to catch a runtime exception

constant.Name: MIDLET_ID_NOT_GIVEN
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's ID is not given

constant.Name: MIDLET_CLASS_NOT_GIVEN
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's class is not given

constant.Name: MIDLET_SUITE_DISABLED
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when a MIDlet's suite is disabled

constant.Name: MIDLET_ISOLATE_RESOURCE_LIMIT
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when system has exceeded the maximum Isolate count.

constant.Name: MIDLET_INSTALLER_RUNNING
constant.Comment: MIDlet start error status, when that MIDlet is being updated.

constant.Name: MIDLET_APPID_NO_FOREGROUND
constant.Comment: Reserved external application id for setting no MIDlet in foreground

constant.Name: MAX_INSTALL_DELETE_NOTIFICATION_RETRIES
constant.Comment: Number of times an install or delete notification has to be retried by the notification manager. Check the specification for the minimal allowed value.
